mean_cn: n. 广播新闻的女主持人
mean_en: a woman who reads the news and introduces the reports of other broadcasters on a television news program
word_etyma: anchor主持节目+ woman女人 → anchorwoman 女主持人
sentence: It's a tough job being a TV anchorwoman, but I love the excitement and the fame!
sentence_trans: 做广播新闻女主持人是一份很难的工作，但我爱它的刺激和名气！
